reviewText:
This intensive toning targets every woman's toughest figure problems.  Tone up those flagging abdominals as well as define and shape-up your buttocks.

Get into shape fast with the Bikini Body Fitness series specially designed to slim and shape your entire body.  Hosted by noted fitness instructor Nancy Marmorat, this series has been seen on television and adopted by millions of viewers around the world.

  WARM UP  8 minutes
  Increase your heart and prepare for exercise

  TARGETED MUSCLE TONING  48 MINUTES
  Tone your abdominal muscles and firm your behind

  COOL DOWN  5 minutes
  Prevent Stiffness

  BONUS: ADVANCED ABS WORKOUT  5 minutes
  Special abs routine

66 minutes, dolby digital stereo, menu LANGUAGE ENGLISH, COLOR, FULL SCREEN 4:3, PLAYABLE IN ALL REGIONS
